body.p: The Wine development release 1.5.8 is now available.

What's new in this release:
More stream functionality in the C++ runtime.
A number of Windows Codecs improvements.
More WBEM classes and properties.
Some HTML Help fixes.
Support for printing fake italic fonts.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
